entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, York Factory
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
